You can spend a <LSTag Type="Resource" Tooltip="SecondWindCharge">Second Wind Charge</LSTag> to get a 1d10 Bonus on the next <LSTag Type="Check" Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Check</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Check" Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>. Heroic Advantage Charge
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on a d20 once per turn. Recharges at the start of your turn.
Heroic Warrior
Once per turn, you can use a <LSTag Type="Resource" Tooltip="HeroicWarrior">Heroic Advantage Charge</LSTag> to reroll any d20 check.
Heroic Warrior: Reroll with Advantage

Spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="HeroicWarrior">Heroic Advantage Charge</LSTag> to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. Heroic Advantage Charge resets at the start of your turn.
War Magic
You can cast one of your cantrips in place of one attack, when you take the attack action.
Improved War Magic
You can cast one of your spells in place of two attacks, when you take the attack action. Spells that use a Bonus Action will still use a Bonus Action instead of two attacks.
You have honed your body and magic for war. You can cast a <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrip</LSTag> instead of an attack action.
Studied Attacks
The spellcaster has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with weapons against this creature.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with weapon attacks against Studied Attacks's target.
Studied Attacks
Gain Advantage on attacks against a target creature after you miss an attack.
You can take an additional two weapon attacks when you take the Attack action. You can cast a cantrip instead of one of the attacks.

You can take an additional two weapon attacks when you take the Attack action. You can cast a spell instead of two of the attacks. Spells that use a Bonus Action will still use a Bonus Action instead of two attacks.

You have become as durable as an iron golem. Whenever you fail a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, you can roll again, using the new result and adding a bonus equal to your Fighter level.
When you use <LSTag Tooltip="SecondWind">Second Wind</LSTag>, you can move up to half your Speed, and you don't provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag> for that turn.
